column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/375984PAS reminds Muhyiddin he'll need their support in PagohShakira Buang16 Mar 2017PAS ulama information chief Khairuddin Aman Razali has reminded Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (Bersatu) president Muhyiddin Yassin that he needs PAS' support in his parliamentary constituency of Pagoh in the coming general election.Khairuddin said this after urging Muhyiddin to consider Muslim voters who are in favour of the proposed amendments to Act 355 in his constituency."He needs to think about getting PAS support in Pagoh in the 14th general election."It is his right to choose (whether to support the Act 355 amendments)... But if Bersatu wants to negotiate with PAS, it must start by agreeing to Act 355," he told Malaysiakini...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access). If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
pagoh .nobody vote pas there, only vote bn.
Cukur... PAS dont need DAP and PKR support to keep their seats...Btw.. today is the 17th March 2017. Deadline for PAS to decide about the alliance...
